text: Total RNA was extracted using the Qiagen RNeasy Plant kit (Qiagen, USA) using buffer QLT.

protocol.text: Using affylmGUI, an expression measure was generated from raw CEL files using the rma function. This method uses a multichip linear model and log2 expression values are provided.

text: All plants were grown in 24 hour light at 19C in Percival growth chambers using 1:1 mixture of Premier Pro-Mix 'BX' potting soil (Premier Horticulture) and vermiculite. Once germinated, plants were fertilized using a complete nutrient solution once per week (Kranz, 1987). Pots containing different genotypes were placed randomly in flats, and rotated between shelves every 3 days.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)

protocol.text: Plants were sampled 2-3 days after the start of flowering, for several days, up to 2 weeks.  Pistils were collected during the same time period each day 10am - 1pm.  Pistils were dissected from flowers using needles, frozen on dry ice, and stored at -80C.
